content.rendered:
We have won the Deloitte Fast 50 award for the fastest growing company in Central and Eastern Europe and we are looking for new colleagues to take our project forward with us! Take advantage of the opportunity and become part of the fast growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague to join our marketing department. The ideal candidate has experience in digital marketing, an interest in what’s going on in the financial markets and a perfect command of the English language.

You’ll be in charge of our website, which receives millions of pageviews from all over the world every month. We run the site in 7 world languages and more versions are on the way. We also write a blog in several languages about trading. Your analysis, insights and new ideas will be vital to the entire marketing team. Can you find out what our visitors enjoy most? What is the most searched for in the world of trading and how do we get to the top? What region do we have the most potential in, etc.? Not only this will be of interest to the copywriter and in fact everyone on the marketing team.

What can you expect?

  • Technical website analysis, creating SEO strategies, keyword and competitor analysis.
  • Regular SEO management based on a defined strategy.
  • Activity reporting, KPIs, analytics.
  • Support e-business by managing the development and implementation of rich content.
  • Keep the organisation up to date with technology related to organic traffic, data analysis in Google Analytics and other available data metric tools.
  • SEO/SEM constant optimization leading to better positioning of the website, generating traffic and conversion

What should you know?

  • You have experience with SEO and WordPress.
  • You are proficient with analytics tools – Google Analytics, GTM, SemRush,
    etc.
  • You know how to pull out the numbers, create analyses and build strategic decisions based on data.
  • You have a positive and entrepreneurial mindset.
  • You are fluent in English (written and spoken), Czech or Slovak is your native language.

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 130+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.

Did we catch your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profil and we’ll gladly meet you, regardless whether in person or online.
